title: Zendesk Receives Takeover Approaches
sub_head: Thoma Bravo and other private-equity firms are circling, while Jana Partners plans proxy fight
body:
Thoma Bravo LP and other private-equity firms have made takeover approaches to Zendesk Inc., which is also facing a proxy fight from an activist investor seeking to scuttle its proposed acquisition of SurveyMonkey ’s parent company, according to people familiar with the matter.
Jana Partners LLC is preparing to nominate four directors to Zendesk’s board, some of the people said, as pressure mounts on the customer-service platform to abandon its agreement to buy Momentive Global Inc.
